alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 628 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Knolls, or 35 miles east of Wendover, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive and Utah Test and Training Range South. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 23 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
